question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. surfboard
B. white pickup truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The surfboard is in the foreground, resting in the red pickup truck bed, while the white pickup truck is in the background, making the surfboard clearly closer to the camera.
